modName: Bandoliers and Stealth Skills Rebalanced Patch
summary: Prevents the Lockpicking and Pickpocketing penalties from Stealth Skills Rebalanced to be applied when wearing Bandoliers.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff7700][size=3][u]What does this mod do?[/u][/size][/color][/b]
[size=2]
This patch switches the "ClothingHands" keyword on Dragten's Bandoliers for "ClothingFeet" Keyword, to allow Stealth Skills Rebalanced to work as intended.[/size]


[b][color=#ff7700][size=3][u]Why is this patch necessary?[/u][/size][/color][/b]

[url=http://http//www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28418/?tab=4&&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D28418%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D859101&pUp=1]Stealth Skills Rebalanced[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291352]kryptopyr[/url] introduces a penalty for Lockpicking and Pickpocketing if you are wearing gloves or gauntlets. The mod looks for all the items that have the keyword "[b]ClothingHands[/b]" and applies the penalty if you are equipping them. Items that also have the keyword "[b]WAF_FingerlessGauntletsBracers_KRY[/b]" (added by the same author) will not have the penalty applied (usually bracers or fingerless gauntlets).

The Bandoliers from the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16438]Bandoliers[/url] mod by [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/1486540-dragten/]Dragten[/url] have the "[b]ClothingHands[/b]" keyword for enchanting purposes, but not the "[b]WAF_FingerlessGauntletsBracers_KRY[/b]" keyword. So, if you equip a bandolier, SSR will read that as a gauntlet and apply the penalties, even if you are not wearing anything on your hands. Adding the "[b]WAF_FingerlessGauntletsBracers_KRY[/b]" keyword to the bandoliers will not work, as it will override anything on your hands (i.e., if you are wearing gauntlets and equip a bandolier with SSR installed, the penalty will be cancelled).

Having this patch installed will get rid of all these problems, as Bandoliers will not interfere with SSR.

[color=#00ffff][b][u]NOTE[/u][/b]: this mod is [b]NOT[/b] necessary if you are using kryptopyr's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49791]Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade[/url].[/color]


[size=3][b][u][color=#ff7700]Installation[/color][/u]

[/b][/size]Install it with NMM or extract it to the Data folder. Overwrite when prompted.

[size=3][b][u]
[color=#ff7700]Load Order[/color][/u]

[/b][/size]Load this after Bandoliers and SSR.
